name: fire-blast
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to burn the target.
short_effect: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.

flavor_text.ruby-sapphire: A fiery blast that scorches all. May cause a burn.
flavor_text.emerald: Incinerates everything it strikes. May cause a burn.
flavor_text.firered-leafgreen: The foe is hit with an intense flame. It may leave the target with a burn.
